name: Ida
description:
I've grown up listening to my Nonna's stories of her childhood in WW2 Italy. I thought I'd try preserving these stories through a short, digital story.  I'd like to note, however, that the events I've put into this game happened 70-80 years ago. Memory fades over time, and I have often heard different versions of these stories from different family members. I've tried to follow the general thread and include what all the retellings have in common.

**If you don't like games that talk about war or death, maybe don't play this one.**

If you want an extra immersive experience, eat some soup while you play! 

This game takes less than 10 minutes.
